title: Leading Global Contributor to Development Aid
description: In 2017, Sweden provided net official development assistance (ODA) amounting to 1.02% of its Gross National Income (GNI), one of the highest contributions globally.

title: High Revenue from Other Taxes
description: In 2022, other taxes constituted 28.21% of Sweden's total revenue, indicating a diversified tax structure.

title: Minimal Particulate Emission Damage
description: Sweden reported particulate emission damage at just 0.009% of its GNI in 2021, showcasing its commitment to environmental health.

title: Strong Net Primary Income from Abroad
description: In 2023, Sweden's net primary income from abroad reached 176.73 billion LCU, highlighting its robust international economic engagements.

title: Near-Universal Male Secondary School Enrollment
description: In 2015, Sweden achieved a male secondary school enrollment rate of 99.81%, reflecting its commitment to education.
